name: Flip Out! (i_suck_at_this)
description: A fun physics-based versus game where you play a nice little game of soccer except you're the ball and the controls suck. I am not liable for any physical damage done to the computer or the other player in the process of playing this game. (Beat the shit out of player 2 though if they do that one move where they sit on the floor and don't move).
